featured.text: But studies suggest that involving children in meal preparation is an important first step in getting them to try new foods.

other.text: According to the passage, the use of movable type was considered as a "great step forward" because (A) it did not need a lot of wood.

definition.en_def: A movement made by lifting the foot and setting it down in a new position.
definition.example: She took a step forward to greet her friend.
